entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mangled code in CngCommon throws away errors #101520
  • ComClassGenerator doesn't find interfaces when the generated code is copied to a source file and GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute is removed #101519
  • Check new Guid at compile time if available #101517
  • CborReader should support reading from streams #101516
  • Verify spin-waiting defaults before yield normalization occurs for ARM processors #101506
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_AltSvc_Test_Http3 timeouts #101505
  • iOS test failing with exit code 22 (disabled device) #101502
  • [browser][WBT] SignalRClientTests.SignalRPassMessageWasmBrowser - Connection closed #101497
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Retrofit XmlNodeList to implement IReadOnlyList #101496
  • [mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #101495
    Future
  • Microsoft Speech Synthesizer defualt female voice lexicon file recognition #101487
  • Settings for a WPF app goes into new folders for every publish of click-once #101486
  • PerformanceCounterCategory.ReadCategory() is taking larger memory allocation #101485
  • .net maui with .net8 has sql-connection-issues when using dapper #101484
  • [wasm] Resolve issues on `runtime-wasm` pipeline and run it on rolling builds #101482
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT null function or function signature mismatch #101481
    9.0.0
  • AccessViolationException on macOS in Asn1Tag.TryDecode #101479
  • Arm64/Sve: Some misc items about SVE Vector Length #101477
  • Arm64/Sve Test: Inputs for LoadVector API test #101475
  • System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WritingTooDeep failure #101470
    9.0.0
  • Stack overflow in WasmTestOnChrome-System.Runtime.Tests #101467
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: What's the future of dynamic code execution, AOT, JIT and interpreter in .NET-based mobile apps? #101466
  • Plan to migrate to zlib-ng #101465
    9.0.0
  • WasmTestOnChrome-System.Runtime.Tests.WorkItemExecution fails with exit code 3221226505 #101464
    9.0.0
  • Timeout in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #101463

Closed

  • profiler\multiple test failed #100114
  • TypeNameParser API #97566
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][wasm] Failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.RunForEachSpecialValue #94891
    8.0.x
  • [8.0] Failure in Wasi.Build.Tests.WasiTemplateTests.ConsoleBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #94537
    8.0.x
  • [8.0] File used by another process in Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #92805
    9.0.0
  • Failing test `tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.cmd` on mono/osx #95669
    Future
  • Mono interpreter leg timing out in CI on a variety of tests #99940
  • [wasm] 'emcmake' is not recognized as an internal or external command, #100973
  • System.Tests.DateTimeTests.ParseExact_Span_ValidInput_Succeeds #101072
    9.0.0
  • [browser] `System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests` fails with out of memory #101436
  • System.Text.Json.Tests timeout in Linux-Debug-x64-Mono_Interpreter_Debug-Ubuntu.2204.Amd64.Open #101508
  • Stale async task when flooding the network with too many async http requests #101411
  • Auto-referenced packages gets added to packages.lock.json for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly #100082
  • GetCustomAttributes throws Exception when attribute contains a type defined in a dynamic assembly. #101343
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #31001
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\HardwareIntrinsics\Arm\Sve\Sve_ro\Sve_ro.cmd #100366
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: New AssemblyName-like type for TypeName parsing #100867
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Interpreter generates bad code for Scalar<T>.Equals #101222
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_AltSvc_Test_Http3.AltSvc_Header_Upgrade_Success failing with timout #101503
  • Timeout in System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers #101193
    9.0.0
  • Tracking issue for remaining AssemblyBuilder.Save work in .NET 9 #92975
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.SequenceEqual #101448
  • SPMI for Arm64 failing asserting for `argReg == argNode->GetRegNum()` #101070
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Determine Reference Type Nullability during runtime #101438
  • Cookie expiration uses local time instead of UTC #95603
    9.0.0
  • cdac src/coreclr/runtime.proj(96,5): error MSB3073 #101471
  • Update the runtime to have deterministic floating-point to integer conversions #61885
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #101518
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Handle case where falseValue is contained #101515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • When initializing Lock in NativeAOT, get the processor count directly instead of using Environment #101514
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Lock spin-waiting on single-proc machines #101513
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Testing] Backport #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101510
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Check if type is compatible right before emitting box #101509
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add missing generic constraints #101504
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Notify the debugger of a cross-thread dependency in Lock #101501
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Reapply keyword `params` #101499
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Restrict indentation size in JsonWriterOptions theories. #101498
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #101491
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • Read EnableWriteXorExecute from runtimeConfig #101490
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add runtime test for static gsharedvt methods #101489
    test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add some R2R missing codes. #101480
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • [mono][wasm]Enable test case in aot mode #101476
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Reduce generic specialized code in console formatters #101474
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update ICollection<T> usage to IReadOnlyCollection<T> where applicable #101469
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • Bump main pre-release version to 5 #101468
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Optimize bundled_resources key creation, hashing, and comparison #101460
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • Disable most of S.T.Json trimming tests on AOT the right way #101418
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add managed blocking info for lock and monitor waits #101192
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Refresh our "dev-innerloop" pipeline jobs #101304
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable terminal logger experience for dotnet test in manual tests. #100333
    area-System.Console
  • Fix checks to accommodate register wraparounds in multi-reg ops #101430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    Servicing-approved, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Add more logging to HTTP3 and QUIC code #101449
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix a compiler error on alpine-arm64 #101206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix deadlock in TestUtilities.TestEventListener #101493
    area-System.Net
  • Disable System.Text.Json.Tests suite on interp with debug runtime #101483
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix Http3LoopbackServer sending GOAWAY cancelling completed request/response. #101447
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Disable frequently failing tests #101439
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Run System.Net.Http trimming tests with AOT #101416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix condition for disabling extra checks in verify_class_overrides #101445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Simplify managed MetadataImport creation #101353
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution

Updated

  • [cdac] Read/store globals from contract descriptor #101450
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host
  • Share return value handling in trim analysis #101398
    needs-area-label
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement Activity.AddLink #101381
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix `LLVMArgWasmVtypeAsScalar` when a method doesn't set its return value #101299
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*ZeroExtendTo*() #101291
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add test for boxing byreflike fail. #101458
    test-enhancement, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] update SDK 22 and wasmtime 19.0.2 #101392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Add support for non-generic method instance #101442
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reloading sources in ConfigurationManager should not dispose IConfigurationSources, only providers #100641
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm, area-CoreLib-mono
  • Remove distros versions calculation #100580
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • enable dependabot for github actions #101406
    area-Meta
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [Test Only] Async interruptions on safepoints with callsite fixups #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add CreateWhileLessThan* #100949
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix big endian issue in Interlocked test cases #101429
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Check more invariants on ABI info and fix some arm32 bugs #101372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update System.Threading.Channels dependency #101101
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
